mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_seat ( cart_idx, seat_idx, cart_seat_name) values (#{cart_idx}, #{seat_idx}, #{cart_seat_name});
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN m.${col} IS NOT NULL AND m.${col} = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS reserved FROM cart_seat cs INNER JOIN m_hall m ON m.seat_idx = cs.seat_idx WHERE m.m_hall_row_no = ${row} and cs.cart_idx = #{cart_idx} and m.seat_idx = #{seat_idx} LIMIT 1
